to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format

sentences.english: Now a new study shows that old people are also vulnerable to the phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 最新的一项研表明老年人也易受到这种现象的伤害。

sentences.english: Realize distribution frames management system, both science and technology project.
sentences.chinese: 实现配线架管理系统，在研科技项目。

sentences.english: UAVs being developed include combat UAVs and those for intelligence, surveillance and reconnaissance.
sentences.chinese: 在研无人机包括战斗无人机和情报监视侦查机。

sentences.english: Now a new study says they have the power to move hurricanes too.
sentences.chinese: 现在一项新的研表示，海洋的颜色也能转移飓风。

sentences.english: Borax must be reduced to powder for infants.
sentences.chinese: 硼砂必须研成细粉才能供婴儿使用。

sentences.english: The problem of edge effect is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了双转子研抛的边缘效应问题。

sentences.english: The Hadley Dentre produces some of the world's most-used climate models.
sentences.chinese: 哈德利中间研拍发了世界最经常使用的气候模子。
